histogram.name: PrintPreview.DestinationAction
histogram.summary: Actions performed by the user when the print destination search widget is shown to the user.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.InitialDisplayTime
histogram.summary: Time from when print preview is initiated until the initial preview is sent to the preview tab for rendering.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.InitializationTime
histogram.summary: Time from when print preview is initiated until the preview PDF generation is started.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.ManagePrinters
histogram.summary: Count the number of requests received to show the manage printers dialog.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.NumberOfPrinters
histogram.summary: Count the total number of printers shown in destination drop down list.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrintAttemptOutcome
histogram.summary: Tracks the outcome of a print journey on ChromeOS. This metric attempts to capture all expected outcomes when a user goes to print. Once Print Preview is opened, this metric gets recorded after one of the following: either Print Preview is canceled and closed, or the attempted print job completes.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrintDocumentType
histogram.summary: Track type of documents printed (HTML vs PDF). Recorded immediately after a user requests that a document be printed.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrinterStatus.AttemptedPrintWithErrorStatus
histogram.summary: Records true if the user printed, or false if the user canceled, while being shown a red/error status for their selected printer on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrinterStatus.AttemptedPrintWithGoodStatus
histogram.summary: Records true if the user printed, or false if the user canceled, while being shown a green/good status for their selected printer on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrinterStatus.AttemptedPrintWithUnknownStatus
histogram.summary: Records true if the user printed, or false if the user canceled, while being shown a grey/unknown status for their selected printer on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrinterStatus.{StatusReason}.PrintJobSuccess
PrintPreview.PrintSettings
histogram.summary: Track the popularity of print settings. (Settings when printing to PDF are excluded from this statistic.)

histogram.name: PrintPreview.PrintSettingsUi
histogram.summary: Actions performed by the user interacting with print settings UI elements.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.RegeneratePreviewRequest.BeforeFirstData
histogram.summary: The number of times regenerate preview requests received before the first preview data is available.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.RenderAndGeneratePDFTime
histogram.summary: Time taken to render and generate PDF for print preview. (Includes time to reflow the page back to normal, but not the time to reflow the page to prepare for printing.)

histogram.name: PrintPreview.RenderAndGeneratePDFTimeAvgPerPage
histogram.summary: Time taken to render and generate PDF for print preview divided by the number of pages. (Includes time to reflow the page back to normal, but not the time to reflow the page to prepare for printing.)

histogram.name: PrintPreview.RendererError
histogram.summary: Count how frequently a set of pre-defined print preview errors occur.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.RenderToPDFTime
histogram.summary: Time taken to render to PDF for print preview.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.StateError
histogram.summary: Records the error that puts Print Preview into an error state. The NONE error state is not recorded. In an error state, the Print button is disabled.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.TransitionedToReadyState
histogram.summary: Records `Success` when Print Preview transitions from the initial NOT_READY state to the READY state. Records `Failure` when Print Preview transitions from the initial NOT_READY state to the ERROR state. This metric only records for non-PDF destinations.

histogram.name: PrintPreview.UserAction
histogram.summary: Action taken by the user in the preview tab such as print, cancel, print to pdf and show advanced print settings dialog.
